article.Heading: India approves plan to list state-run general insurers: Report
article.Summary: Finance Minister Arun Jaitley had announced in last year's budget the government would list state-owned general insurance companies to improve transparency and accountability.
article.Body:
India's cabinet on Wednesday approved a plan to publicly list state-run general insurance companies, news agency NewsRise reported, citing an unnamed government official.

NewsRise did not provide further details.

Finance Minister Arun Jaitley had announced in last year's budget the government would list state-owned general insurance companies to improve transparency and accountability.
